column2: "Na ɔwo
column3: onyimpa ba
column6: Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Hwɛ

column2: "na mebɛdandan wo
column3: na megya wo akɔ
column4: na mama etu efi kwaamu afamu etsiwatsiwa mu aba; na medze wo maba Israel mbepɔw do."

column2: "na mobɔbɔ w’egyen mefi wo nsa bankum mu
column3: na mama w’egyen menaba efi wo nsa nyimfa mu atotɔ."

column2: "Ɔwoara ebɔtɔ wɔ Israel mbepɔw do
column3: ɔwo
column5: na aman a wɔka wo ho no: medze wo mebɛma nnoma edzinam ahorow nyina

column2: "Tɛtɛr mu na ebɔtɔ: na emi na maka
column3: EWURADZE Nyankopɔn na ɔse."

column2: "Na mobɔsoma gya makɔ Magog
column3: na hɔn a wɔtsetse esupruw mu dwudwoodwo no mu: na wobohu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE."

column2: "Na mebɛma woehu me dzin krɔnkrɔn no wɔ me man Israel mu; eso meremma kwan ma woehura me dzin krɔnkrɔn no ho ara bio: na amanaman bohu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE
column3: Israel mu Krɔnkrɔnnyi no."

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: ɔreba
column5: EWURADZE Nyankopɔn na ɔse; iyi nye da a maka ho asɛm no."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔtsetse Israel nkurow mu no befir edzi
column3: na wɔakɔtoto akodze no mu gya wɔahyew no

column2: "dɛm ntsi wɔnnkɛpɛ hamu nyena
column3: eso wonnkotwa bi wɔ kwaa mu; na wobokua akodze no: na wɔbɛfa hɔn a wɔfaa hɔn afo no afo
column4: na wɔafom hɔn a wɔfoom hɔn no EWURADZE Nyankopɔn na ɔse."

column2: "Na da no
column3: ɔbɛba dɛ mebɛma Gog funsie bea wɔ Israel
column4: wɔ akwantsemfo bɔnsa no po boka afamu: na obesiw akwantsemfo no kwan: na hɔ na wobesie Gog na ne nyimpadodow no nyinara: na wɔbɛfrɛ no Hamon gog bɔnsa."

column2: "Na abosoom esuon na Israel fifo dze besie hɔn
column3: ama wɔaatsew asaase no ho."

column2: "Nyew
column3: asaase no do nkorɔfo no nyinara besie hɔn; na da a wɔbɛhyɛ me enyimnyam no

column2: "Na wobeyiyi mbarimba a wɔbɛda ho ayɛ edwuma no esi nkyɛn a wobekyinkyin asaase no do woesie akwantsemfo a wɔaka wɔ asaase no enyi wɔdze atsew ho: abosoom esuon ekyir no
column3: wɔbɔtwee ahwehwɛ."

column2: "Na akwantsemfo no botwa mu wɔ asaase no do; na sɛ biara hu nyimpa ne biew a
column3: nna ɔahyɛ no egyina
column4: ekodu dɛ esiefo no bɛba ebesie no Hamon-gog bɔnsa no mu."

column2: "Na Hamona so bɛyɛ kurow bi ne dzin. Dɛm na wobesi atsew asaase no ho."
"Na ɔwo
column3: onyimpa ba
column4: mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Kasa kyerɛ nnoma horow nyina
column7: Hom mpon hom ho nhyia mbra; hom mboa hom ho ano mfi nkyɛnkyɛn nyina mbra mo kum afɔr a muruku mama hom no ho
column8: mekyerɛ okum afɔr kɛse wɔ Israel mbepɔw do
column9: ma hom edzi nam na wɔanom bɔgya."

column2: "Hom bedzi akatakyi nam
column3: na wɔanom asaase do mbapɔmba bɔgyaa

column2: "Na hom bedzi angoa amee
column3: na wɔanom bɔgya abow
column4: wɔ mo kum afɔr a mekum mama hom no mu."

column2: "Na mpɔnkɔ na ntseaseanam
column3: ɔnye mbarimba akatakyi
column4: na asambarimba nyinara bɛmee hom wɔ mo pon do

column2: "Na medze m’enyimnyam mibesi amanaman mu
column3: na amanaman nyinara bohu m’atsɛmbudze a mayɛ
column4: na me nsa a medze mato hɔn do no."

column2: "Na ofitsi da no dze kɔ no Israel fifo bohu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE hɔn Nyankopɔn."
"Na amanaman bohu dɛ Israel fifo kɔr ndɔmmum wɔ hɔn emumuyɛ ntsi; osiandɛ wɔfomee tsiaa me
column3: na medze m’enyim huntsaa hɔn: nna medze hɔn mehyɛɛ hɔn ahohiahiafo nsa
column4: na hɔn nyinara wɔtotɔr afona ano."

column2: "Mbrɛ hɔn ahoɔfi na mbrɛ hɔn mbrato tse no ara na medze meyɛɛ hɔn; na medze m’enyim huntsaa hɔn."
"Dɛm ntsi mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Afei na medze Jakob befi ndɔmmumkɔ mu asan aba
column3: na mehu Israel fifo nyina mbɔbɔr; na matwe me dzin krɔnkrɔn no ho nyinkun."

column2: "Na wɔbɔsoa hɔn enyimguase
column3: na hɔn mfom a wɔdze afom me no nyinara
column4: ber a wɔbɛtsena hɔn asaase no do dwudwoodwo na obiara nnkeyi hɔn hu no;"

column2: "ber a medze hɔn fi aman mu asan aba
column3: na maboa hɔn ano efi hɔn atamfo nsaase do
column4: na mo krɔnkrɔnyɛ ada edzi wɔ hɔn mu wɔ amanaman pii enyim no."

column2: "Na wobohu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE hɔn Nyankopɔn
column3: wɔ dɛ memaa wɔkɔr ndɔmmum wɔ amanaman mu
column4: na maboaboa hɔn ano akɔ hɔnankasa hɔn asaase do; na mirinngyaa hɔn mu biara bio wɔ hɔ ntsi;"

column2: "eso meremmfa m’enyim nnhuntsa hɔn bio: osiandɛ mehue mo sunsum egu Israel fifo do
column3: EWURADZE Nyankopɔn na ɔse."
